DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Characterize woman 's individual mammographic density ( MD ) longitudinal change trajectory woman breast cancer healthy female participant assess within-individual MD longitudinal change breast cancer risk . - Examine whether patient healthy participant manifest different pattern within-individual change MD evaluate predictor across-individual difference . - Determine whether developmental profile MD differs systematically patient healthy participant . OUTLINE : This prospective , retrospective , control study . Patients healthy participant frequency-matched age ( Â± 2 year ) ethnicity . - Questionnaire : Patients healthy participant complete self-administered questionnaire provide detailed information breast cancer risk factor , include demographic , behavioral lifestyle factor , reproductive history , family history breast cancer , comorbidities , medication hormone replacement therapy use , breast cancer screen history . This information cross-validated document data abstract medical record provide longitudinal historical framework assess individual risk . - Mammographic density ( MD ) assessment : Patients healthy participant evaluate patterns longitudinal change MD subsequent breast cancer risk retrospective review screen mammogram perform prior breast cancer diagnosis . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1500 patient 1500 healthy participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: Patient University Hospitals Breast Center primary care clinic within University Hospitals system Have least 3 screen mammogram since 1994 case , diagnosis breast cancer 20042006 Exclusion criterion : irregular screening ( le 3 mammorgrams since 1994 ) Having breast implant Known carrier BRCA1/BRCA2 gene Unable give write consent
